name: IKImageEditPanelDataSource
desc: The IKImageEditPanelDataSource protocol describes the methods that an IKImageEditPanel object uses to access the contents of its data source object.

items.name: func imageProperties() -> [AnyHashable : Any]!
items.desc: Returns a dictionary of the image properties associated with the image in the image edit panel.

items.name: func setImage(CGImage!, imageProperties: [AnyHashable : Any]!)
items.desc: Sets an image with the specified properties.

items.name: func thumbnail(withMaximumSize: NSSize) -> Unmanaged<CGImage>!
items.desc: Returns a thumbnail image whose size is no larger than the specified size.

items.name: func hasAdjustMode() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the adjust mode view tab should be displayed.

items.name: func hasDetailsMode() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the details mode view tab should be displayed.

items.name: func hasEffectsMode() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the effects mode view tab should be displayed.
